sections.heading: and school nurses; contract; minimum standard
sections.text: Sections 79-843 and 79-844 provide a minimum standard and do not repeal any law of a governing authority that provides for additional contract rights pertaining to the same subject matter.SourceLaws 1973, LB 422, § 2;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-1254.03;Laws 1

79-844.Teachers and school nurses; contract; minimum standard.

Sections 79-843 and 79-844 provide a minimum standard and do not repeal any law of a governing authority that provides for additional contract rights pertaining to the same subject matter.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 422, § 2;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-1254.03;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 474.

Annotations

Former section 79-1254.02 is not applicable to a Class V school district. Kibbon v. School Dist. of Omaha, 196 Neb. 293, 242 N.W.2d 634 (1976).
